See the License for the %% specific language governing permissions and limitations %% under the License. sequenceDiagram participant D as Data Stream participant C as Client participant M as Metadata Stream activate C C-->>+M: TaggedMessage(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) C-->>+D: TaggedMessage(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode) M-->>C: Message(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]) + le_bytes(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker) + schema_metadata) loop each batch par M-->>C: Message(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker]) + le_bytes(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) + batch_metadata) and alt D-->>C: TaggedMessage(IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream] << 55) | le_bytes(IoT_Industrial_PLC_Logic),
bytes=batch_data) else D-->>C: TaggedMessage(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController] << 55) | le_bytes(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode),
bytes=uint64_pairs) end end end M-->>C: Message(IoT_Industrial_EdgeNode]) + le_bytes(IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker)) deactivate M loop C-->>D: TaggedMessage(IoT_Industrial_ActuatorController) end deactivate D deactivate C
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 然后，流程会走到 IoT_Industrial_MQTT_Broker 和 IoT_Industrial_TelemetryStream。
